attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Do not download. It took money out of my account and not only that I took forever to download it doesn't even work after having it for two days I deleted it. So angry

attributes.title: Horrible don’t get!
attributes.review: This app is highly glitchy and when I would try to go on it would take forever it load in! And when I would finally get on the app it would kick me out RIGHT THAT SECOND! 😤😡 DONT BUY!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Horrible app. It steals your private information and sends it to Communist China. Beware of those who say it’s a good app, they’re all either bots or children wanting your information to get into the hands of the Chinese government.

attributes.title: This is a horrible app
attributes.review: All of this news can be found elsewhere and this app is completely unneeded. I know it’s a trend to give it one star, but it is truly a horrible app. Take it down immediately!!

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Took forever to download then it crashed very glitchy and I think my location service data was trying to be read

attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.title: horrifying app
